trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Elemental Evil Player's Companion p. 5, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 165

trait.name: Age
trait.text: Aarakocra reach maturity by age 3. Compared to humans, aarakocra don't usually live longer than 30 years.

trait.name: Alignment
trait.text: Most aarakocra are good and rarely choose sides when it comes to law and chaos. Tribal leaders and warriors might be lawful, while explorers and adventurers might tend toward chaotic.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Aarakocra are about 5 feet tall. They have thin, lightweight bodies that weigh between 80 and 100 pounds. Your size is Medium.

trait.name: Flight
trait.text: You have a flying speed of 50 feet. To use this speed, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor.

trait.name: Talons
trait.text: Your talons are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

trait.name: Language
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common, Aarakocra, and Auran.

trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Elemental Evil Player's Companion p. 9, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 170

trait.name: Unending Breath
trait.text: You can hold your breath indefinitely while you're not incapacitated.

trait.name: Mingle with the Wind
trait.text: You can cast the levitate spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

trait.name: Age
trait.text: Genasi mature at about the same rate as humans and reach adulthood in their late teens. They live somewhat longer than humans do, up to 120 years.

trait.name: Alignment
trait.text: Independent and self-reliant, genasi tend toward a neutral alignment.

trait.name: Size
trait.text: Genasi are as varied as their mortal parents but are generally built like humans, standing anywhere from 5 feet to over 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

trait.name: Languages
trait.text: You can speak, read, and write Common and Primordial. Primordial is a guttural language, filled with harsh syllables and hard consonants.

trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Elemental Evil Player's Companion p. 9, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 170

trait.name: Earth Walk
trait.text: You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

trait.name: Merge with Stone
trait.text: You can cast the pass without trace spell once with this trait, requiring no material components, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for this spell.

trait.name: Description
trait.text: Source: Elemental Evil Player's Companion p. 9, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 170

trait.name: Darkvision
trait.text: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. Your ties to the Elemental Plane of Fire make your darkvision unusual: everything you see in darkness is in a shade of red.

trait.name: Fire Resistance
trait.text: You have resistance to fire damage.

trait.name: Reach to the Blaze
trait.text: You know the produce flame cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast the burning hands spell once with this trait as a 1st-level spell, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

trait.text: Source: Elemental Evil Player's Companion p. 10, Explorer's Guide to Wildemount p. 170

trait.name: Acid Resistance
trait.text: You have resistance to acid damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
trait.text: You can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Swim
trait.text: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

trait.name: Call to the Wave
trait.text: You know the shape water cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the create or destroy water spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it this way when you finish a long rest. Constitution is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
